settings.intro_body: Hill Country Blooms exists to celebrate the growers, families, and stories rooted in Central Texas soil.

settings.heading: Our roots
settings.body: Our flowers are grown by Hill Country farmers who know the land and its changing seasons.

settings.heading: Meet the founder
settings.body: A local writer and designer turned florist, crafting bouquets that read like love letters to Central Texas.

settings.heading: Community promise
settings.body: Each order supports Lampasas farmers, veterans’ programs, and the Hill Country arts scene.

settings.alt_text: Hill Country Blooms founder arranging bouquets
settings.caption: Hand-prepared in Lampasas — delivered across the Hill Country.
